alert.note: Alert for Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:18AM CDT until April 05 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LEAKE...NORTHEASTERN RANKIN AND NORTHERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 318 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leesburg, or 12 miles northwest of Morton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Tuscola around 335 AM CDT. Madden around 350 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lena, Walnut Grove, Redwater, Sebastopol and Standing Pine. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
